step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in the next repetitions.
You're raising your hands well. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you bring your hands towards your forehead.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
Holding the stretch steady is great. Ensure your head stays upright and you're not pulling forward.
Returning to the start smoothly is good. Pay attention to keeping your wrists aligned as you reverse the motion.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straighter and elbows closer as you move your hands. This helps you get the most out of the stretch.
